forms.document_type: ROI authorization form (third-party release, duplicate URL)

access_pathway.primary_pathway_description: A dedicated 1-page 'Patient Request for Health Information' form with a 'Myself' checkbox, separate from the third-party authorization form, plus a patient portal alternative (LiveWell).

bright_spots: Dedicated patient access form separate from third-party authorization
Patient portal callout at top of form directing to LiveWell for online access
Granular record-type selection with 22+ checkbox options
Multiple electronic delivery methods including encrypted email and patient portal
Spanish versions of both forms available
No purpose-of-release requirement for patient access requests

findability.rationale: Level 5: Prominently available with minimal effort — the medical records page is reachable in 2 clicks from the homepage, forms appear in web search results, and the page is well-organized with clear download links.

technical_accessibility.rationale: Level 3: Usable digitally with workarounds — the PDF has a text layer but zero fillable fields, requiring print-and-handwrite workflow; however, fax and email submission are available as electronic submission options.

content_design.rationale: Level 4: Well-organized with minor issues — the single-page form has logical flow, clear section headers, granular record selection, and plain language, though the dense single-page layout results in small text and tight spacing.

patient_centeredness.rationale: Level 5: Process designed around patient self-access as a first-class use case — Aurora provides a dedicated 'Patient Request for Health Information' form clearly distinct from the third-party authorization, with a 'Myself' checkbox, no purpose-of-release requirement, and a prominent patient portal callout.

compliance.rationale: Level 4: Minor ambiguities but nothing materially impeding — no notarization required, non-discrimination language present, proper minor authorization; the only gap is the vague '(Fees may apply)' without amounts or fee schedule.

overall.summary: Aurora Medical Center - Grafton offers a well-differentiated patient access pathway with a dedicated form, patient portal alternative, and easy findability, held back from an A primarily by the non-fillable PDF format that forces a paper workflow.
